Dislikes For Piazza™

Disclaimer: This extension is not officially affiliated with Piazza.

Dislikes For Piazza™ adds a simple “dislike” button to comments and answers on Piazza, enabling more balanced feedback. Instantly see dislike counts to help identify which responses are less helpful, creating a more informative and constructive learning environment.

Why Install?

Balanced Feedback: Not all answers are helpful—use dislikes to clarify content quality.
Instant Updates: Dislike counts update immediately as users click.
Seamless Integration: Works smoothly with the existing Piazza interface.
Install Dislikes For Piazza™ to improve your Piazza experience today!
